key.statement: (@cm\:content.mimetype:application/pdf OR @cm\:content.mimetype:application/msword OR @cm\:content.mimetype:application/mspowerpoint OR @cm\:content.mimetype:text* OR @cm\:content.mimetype:application/vnd.oasis.opendocument* OR @cm\:content.mimetype:application/vnd.ms-powerpoint OR @cm\:content.mimetype:application/vnd.ms-excel)
